name: Gun Fight (TheClockworks)
description:
A recreation of the original Gun Fight. The goal is to get a shot off on the opposing player. The game ends when one player is shot, both players run out of ammo, or the time runs out.

Player 1 Controls:

Q to aim up

E to aim down

WASD to move

Spacebar to fire

V to fire shotgun

Player 2 Controls:

(Use the numpad)

7 to aim up

9 to aim down

8456 to move

Down arrow key to fire

Left arrow key to fire shotgun

Press the H key at any time to reset the game

(This game should be compatible with controllers, but if it isn't, let me know and I will try to fix it.)
